title: Document an EPA Inspection
description: An inspector from the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) conducts a site visit. The safety manager must document the visit and any findings.

tasks.description: Create a new entry in the regulatory inspection log.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new log entry is created.

tasks.description: Log the agency as 'EPA', the inspector's name, and the purpose of the visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The basic details of the inspection are recorded.

tasks.description: Record the outcome of the inspection as 'No Violations Found' and attach a scan of the inspector's field report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The outcome is documented and supporting evidence is attached.
